title: Add per-issue stars
description: First column, sortable, interactive (click a star outline to star the issue, and that sets it as starred), filterable like open/closed/etc.

title: Add audit logging for admin actions
Invalidate sessions when user is deleted
Fix browser back button navigation
description: App uses React state for navigation (view, selectedIssue, selectedRepo) but never updates browser URL/history. Back button navigates away from app instead of within it. Fix by syncing state with History API: push state on view changes, listen for popstate, encode state in URL paths/params.

title: Add Premium users
description: Higher tier than user, lower than admin.

title: Add Secure flag to session cookie
Add user allowlist/invite system for private access
Add rate limiting on OAuth endpoints
